net.semanticmetadata.lire.imageanalysis.filters

Class CannyEdgeDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.semanticmetadata.lire.imageanalysis.filters.CannyEdgeDetector

  • public class CannyEdgeDetector
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a simple implementation of a Canny Edge Detector.
    Author:
    Mathias Lux, mathias@juggle.at, 05.04.13

    • Constructor Detail

      • CannyEdgeDetector

        public CannyEdgeDetector(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
                         double thresholdHigh,
                         double thresholdLow)
        Create a Canny Edge Detector for the given image. Set the thresholds yourself. Use filter() to create the edge image.
        Parameters:
        image - the input image.
        thresholdHigh - higher of the thresholds
        thresholdLow - lower of the thresholds

      • CannyEdgeDetector

        public CannyEdgeDetector(java.awt.image.BufferedImage bimg)
        Create a Canny Edge Detector for the given image. Set the thresholds yourself. Use filter() to create the edge image.
        Parameters:
        bimg -

    • Method Detail

      • filter

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage filter()
        Returns the edge image in grayscale. Edges are black (int 0) all other pixels are white (int 255)
        Returns:
        the filtered image.
